WorkItem.Description:
Say we have the JS structure: 
```
ts
    a.ts
    foo
    |    b.ts
    |    c.ts
js
    a.js
    foo
    |    b.js
    |    c.js
```

If we compile with all three files with outDir `js` its all okay. But if we only compile `b.ts` or `c.ts` with outDir set to js then we would get: 
```
js    
    |    b.js
    |    c.js
```

Reference : https://github.com/grunt-ts/grunt-ts/issues/77
